website_summaries.verdict: A durable five-piece sectional that includes many features expected in higher-priced models.
pros: This outdoor daybed has a UV-resistant adjustable canopy that can help protect users from the sun
It includes four pieces that can be configured in a number of ways, and the cushions have a zippered cover for easy cleaning
cons: The assembly is difficult and may take the greater part of the day, even when using two people

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!  Once you get it together....
customer_reviews.text: I adore this outdoor daybed. It is big and comfy and the awning provides excellent coverage. However, I have to take off a star for the assembly of this. Whatever you do, HIRE someone to put this together. I hired Amazon Services patio furniture assembly to put this together. $122.00 well spent!!! It took two technicians (who do this for a living) 6 hours to put this together. Once it IS together, it is amazing. The pieces stay together, but the cushions slide off. This was solved by using some double sided carpet tape between the base and the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Schantz

customer_reviews.title: Great furniture; difficult installation
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bed with thick cushions. However, a lot of nuts and bolts making installation difficult. Took 3+hrs with 2 people. Recommend paying for the installation.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but a lot to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look and size of this. The padding is much thicker than it seems. Like most of the comments, this took a long time to put together (many many hours) and you definitely need 2 people. Make sure someone has the ability to stay organized and keep track of all of the different sizes of screws. The instructions are pictures only and we were able to follow most of the instructions fairly well until it came to the canopy. Looking at the full color pictures on Amazon helped with those final steps.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I really like the look
customer_reviews.text: I am rating this product amongst daybeds. It is a rather long process to put together (six hrs). But I figure all daybeds are a pain in the arsh. A lot of the bolt heads are to close to the wicker to get the Allen wrenches in. Also, for the center table, use a vise grip to hold the flanges together while you put the bolts in. Shipping is slow, maybe because there was a delay do to wether. I think it Looks great
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: nice set, but key to building is to have good tools
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews with issues putting the unit together. If you don't have your own tools, it will be difficult, but using and elbow on my cordless drill made this very easy. There are some alignment problems, but if you ensure not to tighten all screws util all are in place on the section you are working on, it goes much easier. The plans for the canopy are actually opposite in regards to size of polls needed, but it was fairly obvious when you start to build, easy correction. we'll see how the pads hold up, they do slide around, but added none slip material underneath and pads seem to hold on better.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Garcia

customer_reviews.title: The pieces separate when you try to use this as a day bed so it is almost impossible to lye on and relax.
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty piece of outdoor furniture but not very comfortable at all. The pieces separate when I try to use this as a day bed so it is almost impossible to lye on and relax. I have to figure out some kind of a way to keep the pieces together so it can be used as a daybed. I would not recommend this product as a day bed it is better if you will use it as a separate seating area, but if that is what you want their are much better options available for that too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kilcoyne

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL SHIPPING!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: partial order received. did not receive the complete item missing hardware and tools. no canopy and only have the seating.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S. Carignan

customer_reviews.title: Resort Look!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! Our yard looks like the Loews Miami now! However plan a LOT of time and patience to put together. Read the directions and then review as you will have to do a lot of figuring on your own. The headache of building it is worthwhile! Classy! We scotchgarded cushions too so they will last and last.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Solvesit

customer_reviews.title: Mad!  1/2 screws missing
customer_reviews.text: Missing 1/2 the screws! No one to call! Mad! No number to call. Called shipping number in box they put me in hold and 30 minutes later they hung up! Tried putting together first part and it broke! Rusted right out of box!!
customer_reviews.author: The Peppy Techie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent patio daybed
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I absolutely love this daybed. Nice for snuggles! It loves gorgeous on the patio. The cushions are firm and we love that is separates into separate pieces for company to sit on. Only slight drawback, is the short length of cord that's suppose to tie the canopy cover back! It should be long enough to tie in a bow instead of having to tie it in a knot. Solved that though by creating my own.
customer_reviews.author: sstar70

customer_reviews.title: It’s sturdy- cushions move a TON
customer_reviews.text: Easier to install than some reviews make it seem. Just follow directions diligently. Get an electric Alan wrench screwdriver to make it way easier. Put pieces together before tightening down. Did take several hours but I used their manual alan wrench. Pillow issue- really hard to keep seat cushions together, they slide apart and you end up with your butt on the plastic seat. Have to continuously readjust. Umbrella/cover part COULD NOT FIGURE OUT! Followed instructions, look at pictures in manual and amazon and it just didn’t work- smallest bar cut into back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Six hours to put together
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of ordering this item without reading the reviews. Needless to say the five to six hour time it takes to assemble is dead on. There were screws and little things missing just more aggravating than anything, was able to find at local hardware store. Definitely needs Velcro to keep pads from moving or blowing away. It is smaller than I thought it would be, but very comfortable for two and after the pain of putting together it looks good. Next time I will pay the extra money not to have this much hassle you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Randal Garden

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I had one similar at my last home. When we sold the lady wanted it because it was a nice piece by the pool. I bought this one this time because the canopy looked to be more sturdy and it is. The only downside to this piece is that the cushions move a lot and if you try to sit back on it all together you move the bottom pieces as well and will be adjusting in order to get comfortable. Still a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Gebhardt

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I had to email customer service to find out if there was a 3rd box as each box said 1 of 1 and 2 of 2 and I put everything together of the 2 boxes I received in the day and I had pieces missing. I get from customer service that I need patience when all I asked if there was another box that I am missing. Not cool. Also, it takes hours and hours to put together. It rained the 1st night and all rust was on my brand new patio, which had to come from the screws, which are probably not weatherproof
customer_reviews.author: Maria Pasciuto

customer_reviews.title: Baby you can do it, take the time, do it right, you can do it bay-bee...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome but does require some time and patience putting it together. Don’t let the reviews about assembly scare you away. The bed comes in three boxes with a sheet clearly describing what is in each box and picture directions of how to assemble. Set aside a Saturday and take it slow. I assembled this in about 8 hours taking lots of breaks. Me, a 47-year-old woman with no engineering degree and I’m not a rocket scientist, either. The bed is solid and looks great. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: V. P. Gould

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed but pay for the professional install
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice day bed I was leery about putting it together myself even though I am good with that because of so many people saying it took six hours ultimately I ended up paying Amazon $100 to have someone install it and sure enough they took him just about six hours well worth the money and I stay bad but highly recommend paying for professional install simply to save you six hours
customer_reviews.author: B. Hoehl

customer_reviews.title: Definitely need better directions and clips to hold separate pieces together
customer_reviews.text: Finally, after 9 hours of assembly, able to use. Definitely need better directions and clips to hold separate pieces together. I used some from an old furniture set.
customer_reviews.author: Marifrances Gullo

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sun
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great on our roof top deck. We like the thickness of the cushion. It was a nightmare to put together. It was a two man job,the location for the varis nuts and bolds were in awkward places. The directions were not the best. I don't like how the zippers are facing outwards as if they are part oh the design and the cushions slip and slide when we lay on them, we are constantly adjusting them. I will have to invest in some velcro for the underside of the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Once it was put together it looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The item ships in 3 boxes, and is very time consuming to put together. Once it was put together it looks exactly like the picture. I wouldn't recomend it for larger persons, I don't think it could hold the weight. The one important thing is DO NOT TIGHTEN THE SCREWS UNTIL THE END, otherwise it will be very difficult to assemble. I really like the daybed, and it has nice thick cushions
customer_reviews.author: paula rugolo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, frustrated I spent that much money.
customer_reviews.text: Putting it together took about two hours. I can see where some people who are not handy would have a lot of difficulty with it. It’s not comfortable at all the cushions move. You can’t sit or lay in it because they separate. It’s much smaller then I thought. Yes I should have measured, but it’s really small for the price. For that price I thought it would be twice the size. Cushions are water resistant but they are not dirt resistant. In two minutes with kids it looked dirty already.
customer_reviews.author: T. Walrod

customer_reviews.title: So hard to put together!!!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly hard to put together especially the shade - the directions are wrong! Took 4+ hours for people who are well knowledgeable in furniture assembly. Cushions work well and are pretty comfy but they slip and slid everywhere you will need to buy and attach some Velcro strips. Seems to have held up only had it for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Haggard

customer_reviews.title: The one thing Do not tighten down screws untill you have them all in a section. This is very true!
customer_reviews.text: Love it and it is very comfortable. Took a while to get together, but I did it by myself. I would buy it again and recommend it to a friend. If you have a better Allen wrenches use it. My hands hurt from using the one that came with it. I was to lazy to go look at my tools.
customer_reviews.author: Cody J. Engstrom

customer_reviews.title: Tricky assembly
customer_reviews.text: This product was tough to assemble. Not all screw holes aligned and I was concerned about the design to hold a couple people. There’s some screw holes that were difficult to access and feel like you got proper tightness. It looks good once completed but took a couple sessions to get there
customer_reviews.author: Lori Miller

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble and not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Way too difficult to assemble. Took two adults 4+ hours of hard work. And don’t count on two people sitting on the main lounger with the weight being supported by 1inch metal lips for the base to sit on. First night sitting on it and the base has snapped underneath the lip. Two of these pieces is not enough to support people sitting on it! Spend more money and buy a better set.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I cant believe how bad the quality is
customer_reviews.text: You would think this was a $99 dollar special! After 6hours , its not level and not even sure it will stay together. Holes don't line up, some holes aren't even present and need to be drilled before you can assemble. 89% of the screws strip before tightened. Doesnt create a perfect circle without gaps. Very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: J Burrink

customer_reviews.title: Canopy directions were a nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice product for the money. It arrived in three boxes none of which contained the directions so I had to email the seller and wait for them to send them to me. The directions were not bad, but even with an extensive toolbox took hours to put together. Then I got to the canopy, Then it all fell apart. The canopy directions were almost useless. I had to put it together and take it apart three times and still am not 100% sure I have it right . I wish I could’ve given it a higher rating but the canopy itself destroyed tgat.
customer_reviews.author: Garett L Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Assembly required
customer_reviews.text: I return the order because I thought it came assembled upon reading the reviews I canceled the order because of assembly comments. I don't know how sturdy it is or anything else. But they were kind enough to refund my order less shipping cost.
customer_reviews.author: Running with scissors

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put together.
customer_reviews.text: It's day 4 and the set is still sitting in my livingroom. I'm stuck on step 7 and can't figure out what to do. Very frustrated right now. Other than that, it looks like a sturdy thing and the colors are exactly what I saw online. I am not sure yet if it is comfortable. The cushions are nice and thick, though.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this item very difficult to assemble but the quality of the fabric and material are of very poor quality. This item is not worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora marquez

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed. After five hours of putting together
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. After five hours of putting together , this set is so small it looks like it’s msde for children not adults. It is so out of place on my patio and is smaller than my other regular sized patio chairs and furniture. Very, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Size is WRONG
customer_reviews.text: Very deceiving. The description states the day bed is 72.4 inches in diameter. The actual size is 64 inches diameter. Almost a foot less. If you are taller than 5'4", you'll have your legs hanging off then end.
customer_reviews.author: Donelle Fenn

customer_reviews.title: There’s better out there
customer_reviews.text: Man was this a pain to put together. Directions have little black lined diagrams with labeling but they are really hard to follow. Would be so much better if they took photo snap shots of the assembly steps on the product! I almost through this in the pool we got so frustrated. Over all quality is good, but I’d recommend a unit with a single top cushion. These little bed cushions move all over when you try to sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No instructions no pictures and it is not the size shown in the picture  STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.text: This product came in 3 boxes with 50 pieces and absolutely no instructions. No pictures of how it should look NOTHING. I would not recommend ever buying this product. THE SELLER ALSO WOULD. NIT DO ANYTHING WHEN I CONTACTED THEM ASKING FOR INSTRUCTIONS.It is also deceptive in the picture the 72” dimensoon is to the widest point of the backrest. It is actually 65” in diameter on the cushion part. DO NOT PURCHASE YOU WIILL BE SORRY. Spend your money on something else.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F Sawyer II

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 on the best gift ever by my 10 year old and 10/10 on how hard it was to put together. So, it is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: So hard to put together that it was crazy! But, my daughter gave a 10/10 on the best gift ever, ever! Soooo, it was worth it. I used 10 cans of Scotch Guard on the cushions and the top. So glad I took the time to do that!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Great product, difficult to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for 1/3 of the price I’ve seen advertised elsewhere (for the same product). Fair warning, it’s not simple by any means to assemble. Be prepared to spend Atleast 6 hours putting this thing together (especially if you’re flying solo). I consider myself handy, and it’s just very tedious and bolts are in awkward positions.
customer_reviews.author: eddie le

customer_reviews.title: Once assembled you will love it
customer_reviews.text: Other than being very difficult to assemble, (you need to make sure the rods for the canopy are in the right order, mine were mislabeled) I love the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee

customer_reviews.title: Nice furniture, not practical or convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Patio furniture looks nice, but the size is smaller than you expect or see in the picture. It was really hard to assemble all these pieces. It took us forever to put all together. It is not convenient to use as a bed. Everything is moving all around. So my rating is not high. Give yourself the second thought. Do you really want to pay for something, which is not the right size and not practical?
customer_reviews.author: Lala Markosian

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but worst thing I have ever put together.
customer_reviews.text: Worst product I have ever put together. The finished product is nice, but the directions are almost pointless, and getting some of the bolts in are very difficult. Also don’t don’t lose or mis place any pieces bc they don’t give you any extras.
customer_reviews.author: Erik and Kristin Williams

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying our patio
customer_reviews.text: This was a little tough to put together but not as bad as other reviews made out. Did have an issue with one piece breaking but they sent replacement parts right away.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J.

customer_reviews.title: Good pool furniture
customer_reviews.text: Good pool furniture. Believe other reviews that it takes 8+ hours to assemble. The cushions slide around a bit. Still, all in all, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: SARAH LEE

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this product! Looks beautiful, exactly like the picture. The customer service department is excellent! There was a piece missing and the company immediately shipped a replacement. Very cordial and easy to work with. I highly recommend this product and company!
customer_reviews.author: Marydith Young

customer_reviews.title: We love our set!
customer_reviews.text: The part letters in the manual were wrong for the canopy assembly but correct if you go to the on line one. More info for assembly online with better pictures for guidance. But very very nice set
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the directions was terrible -terrible- terrible- what should have taken three hrs took ...
customer_reviews.text: the directions was terrible -terrible- terrible- what should have taken three hrs took 12 hrs and some toally a wast of time stay away from this- who ever made those directions should refund my hard earned money
customer_reviews.author: andrew v.

customer_reviews.title: Patio Furniture
customer_reviews.text: This set looks amazing but was a pain to assemble. Instructions were not included and the pre-drilled holes do not properly align with the screws in all places. The set also has the tendency to move apart when laying on it as a bed. Otherwise good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Tsirulnik

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Paid for assembly. First guy tried to hold us up for more money. Second guy put it together incorrectly. Cushions slide all over. Seriously regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Wischmann

customer_reviews.title: Patience is a Must
customer_reviews.text: Just what I want. Need a college Engineer degree to put together and a lot of patience and time. Lots of pieces and hundreds of screws, In the end customer service was great to deal with and we are enjoying lazy afternoons in style.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Northrup

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price but could use many improvements
customer_reviews.text: Terrible assembly directions! If you do not have a drill with attachments it will take forever to assemble. Wish there was a way to attach pieces together. Cushions slide off constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: look this is tough to assemble directions horrible....but its awesome when done very happy. BUY VELCRO
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Blaser

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Sun bed I can afford
customer_reviews.text: It may take some extra effort to put together but well worth the trouble. The cushions are thick enough to be comfortable and we spray rubber on one side to discourage sliding.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Instructions are not detailed however if you have a boyfriend like mine who can put anything together than it won’t take long at all! Very sturdy and comfy! Added my small fire pit to the center to switch up the look for evenings!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shon E.

customer_reviews.title: Whole concept sucks, from tools, description how to Assemble, the work, just a nightmare al around.
customer_reviews.text: The worst thing I ever bought. You guys can thank my wife that we are keeping it, but she didn't assemble that c...
customer_reviews.author: Holger Ramcke

customer_reviews.title: Madness
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst to put together... they couldn’t make this any harder.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Sookhan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to assemble need two people but worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rivera Hill

customer_reviews.title: this item was not designed well.
customer_reviews.text: The assembly is not easy. This bed was not designed well. Screws in a bad place and the overhang directions were not specific enough.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and comfortable. Assembly takes time
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great and cushions are super comfy. Not easy to put together though
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty plan a long time to put together
customer_reviews.text: It’s very nice don’t have the canopy on but it took 7 hours to put it together. Sturdy and comfortable the blue pillows we bought separately
customer_reviews.author: Margaret E. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price compared to similar products
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price compared to similar products. Assembly is very time consuming. A ton of nuts and bolts with just an alan wrench. In retrospect I would have paid for the service to build. Otherwise, I'm really happy with how it came out.
customer_reviews.author: eduardo cepeda

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Product looks beautiful, it’s just tough to assemble because your trying to turn the Allen key inch by inch. Deff need 2 or more people to assemble. Took me 7 hours to assemble because my fathers back hurt from helping me so we had to take a few breaks! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to assemble but great once it’s done! Fits perfectly in the backyard. Would buy again!

product_meta.title: TANGKULA Patio Furniture Outdoor Lawn Backyard Poolside Garden Round with Retractable Canopy Wicker Rattan Round Daybed, Seating Separates Cushioned Seats
feature_bullets: ❀Better Than Most: Featuring trendy appearance and elegant style, it is made up with solid steel frame and high-quality PE wicker with cream sponge cushions ensuring a long lifetime. Its excellent craftsmanship and retractable sun cover double the comfort for you to totally relax yourself and relieve the pressure with your friends or families.

❀Wide Application: Made of lightweight rattan material, it can be carried easily and labor-efficiently to the desired place. Its compact structure and beautiful texture can surprisingly highlight your patio or poolside deco, perfect for your patio, balconies, apartment or terrace.

❀Creative Reconfiguration: The seat pieces are infinitely reconfigurable, allowing you to rearrange to meet your different demands. It can be changed from stylish daybed to premium 4 pcs sofa set in one breath. And the separable seat cushion also enables you a quick wash.

❀Weather Resistant: Featuring sturdy construction and durable use, this patio outdoor wicker can well stand for both test of time and high temperature, which is perfect for any outdoor and indoor use and fulfills your purpose to decorate the place you desire. Our wicker item is durable enough to withstand rain and wind for year-round use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars101 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
